title: Web Developer
about: I am a web developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies, including React, CSS, JavaScript, and JSON. I follow a structured approach to web development, organizing projects into dedicated folders like pages for full pages and components for reusable elements. This ensures scalability and maintainability.

title: Barista
about: As a barista, I have a passion for crafting exceptional coffee and delivering outstanding customer service. I thrive in fast-paced environments and enjoy connecting with customers to create a welcoming experience.
